articles.description: Some retailers are still selling the iPhone 8 despite Apple discontinuing the device. But you should just get the new iPhone SE instead.
articles.content: In a bid to lure budget-minded iPhone fans, Apple debuted its new iPhone SE for 2020 on April 15 for $399 (£419, AU$749). It's a sequel to its 2016 iPhone of the same name. The new iPhone SE's specs are similar to the iPhone 8 from three years ago, which is l… [+8211 chars]
